result.reason: Feature request to bridge the existing credential manager with the import feature, allowing users to assign credential records during connection import instead of only storing inline credentials.
result.approach: Add optional credential record reference (CredentialRecordId) to ConnectionInfo, then enhance the import dialog to offer a post-import step where users can map imported connections to existing credential manager entries instead of storing credentials inline.
